subject: RE: [junit] Re: How to comment test methods in Junit 4?
msgSnippet: ... http://www.junit.org/junit/javadoc/index.htm ... As far as I can tell, I m solely writing to the list, directly, without any CCs. Regards, Ilja
messageBody:
> It's publicly available from junit.org, or directly here:
>
> http://junit.sourceforge.net/javadoc_40/index.html
>
> Where were you looking for it that it didn't appear?

http://www.junit.org/junit/javadoc/index.htm

> P.S. Ilja, are you CC'ing the list, or is only Cedric doing that?

As far as I can tell, I'm solely writing to the list, directly, without any
CCs.


Regards, Ilja
